# <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/10.04/serverguide/C/installation.html|Install Ubuntu 10.04 Server]]</nowiki>
# Update to the most current state in the Ubuntu archive:
<pre>
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
</pre>
1. Update the time on your server using ntpdate
<pre>
sudo ntpdate ntp.ubuntu.com
</pre>
1. Install the following supporting packages on the server
<pre>
sudo apt-get install euca2ools openssh-server ntp
</pre>
